content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://sadevbrdatalakemalwee.dfs.core.windows.net/raw', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE raw_data.sap_mvke (
	[MANDT] varchar(8000),
	[MATNR] varchar(8000),
	[VKORG] varchar(8000),
	[VTWEG] varchar(8000),
	[LVORM] varchar(8000),
	[VERSG] varchar(8000),
	[BONUS] varchar(8000),
	[PROVG] varchar(8000),
	[SKTOF] varchar(8000),
	[VMSTA] varchar(8000),
	[VMSTD] varchar(8000),
	[AUMNG] numeric(38,18),
	[LFMNG] numeric(38,18),
	[EFMNG] numeric(38,18),
	[SCMNG] numeric(38,18),
	[SCHME] varchar(8000),
	[VRKME] varchar(8000),
	[MTPOS] varchar(8000),
	[DWERK] varchar(8000),
	[PRODH] varchar(8000),
	[PMATN] varchar(8000),
	[KONDM] varchar(8000),
	[KTGRM] varchar(8000),
	[MVGR1] varchar(8000),
	[MVGR2] varchar(8000),
	[MVGR3] varchar(8000),
	[MVGR4] varchar(8000),
	[MVGR5] varchar(8000),
	[SSTUF] varchar(8000),
	[PFLKS] varchar(8000),
	[LSTFL] varchar(8000),
	[LSTVZ] varchar(8000),
	[LSTAK] varchar(8000),
	[LDVFL] varchar(8000),
	[LDBFL] varchar(8000),
	[LDVZL] varchar(8000),
	[LDBZL] varchar(8000),
	[VDVFL] varchar(8000),
	[VDBFL] varchar(8000),
	[VDVZL] varchar(8000),
	[VDBZL] varchar(8000),
	[PRAT1] varchar(8000),
	[PRAT2] varchar(8000),
	[PRAT3] varchar(8000),
	[PRAT4] varchar(8000),
	[PRAT5] varchar(8000),
	[PRAT6] varchar(8000),
	[PRAT7] varchar(8000),
	[PRAT8] varchar(8000),
	[PRAT9] varchar(8000),
	[PRATA] varchar(8000),
	[RDPRF] varchar(8000),
	[MEGRU] varchar(8000),
	[LFMAX] numeric(38,18),
	[RJART] varchar(8000),
	[PBIND] varchar(8000),
	[VAVME] varchar(8000),
	[MATKC] varchar(8000),
	[PVMSO] varchar(8000),
	[/BEV1/EMLGRP] varchar(8000),
	[/BEV1/EMDRCKSPL] varchar(8000),
	[/BEV1/RPBEZME] varchar(8000),
	[/BEV1/RPSNS] varchar(8000),
	[/BEV1/RPSFA] varchar(8000),
	[/BEV1/RPSKI] varchar(8000),
	[/BEV1/RPSCO] varchar(8000),
	[/BEV1/RPSSO] varchar(8000),
	[PLGTP] varchar(8000),
	[J_3AVASG] varchar(8000),
	[J_3APIND] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'brazil/saptable/mvke/*/*/*/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM raw_data.sap_mvke
GO
